programme.desc: The Rodriguezes revisit Lisa and Graham in Alicante to see how their new life in Spain is going. The Garners find out if Janice and Bill still love their dream home in Almería.

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: George tries to unearth why his one-euro Sicilian townhouse was abandoned. Mike struggles to bring power to his ancient settlement in northern Spain.

programme.title: George Clarkes Amazing Spaces
programme.sub-title: Double Decker Retreat and Boat Hotel
programme.desc: George meets carpenter Adam, who wants to turn a 30-year-old double decker bus into a luxury holiday retreat. George also visits a couple who have given up their jobs and thrown their life savings into designing a boat hotel.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Tom and his son Alan look for a holiday home for Tom on beautiful Gran Canaria, that their whole family can enjoy. Can Ben Hillman find the perfect place for his budget of £120k?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Dee and Maurice Evans have decided the time is right to buy a holiday home close to the theme parks in South Orlando. Laura Hamilton guides them through the booming local market, showing them five properties.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The first to host from Bristol is all-singing, all-dancing, theatre darling Richard Hope-Hawkins, whose eclectic menu divides his guests before theyve even arrived. While, teacher Laura is impressed by the sound of Richards home-made pate,food-writer Daryl is intrigued by the Rod Steiger Gunge cake, and vegetarian Zoe is not looking forward to her alternative starter of red and green pepper mousse.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Second to host in Bristol is super-organised primary school teacher Laura Ford, whos leaving nothing to chance with the planning for her dinner party, featuring a starter of prawn, chorizo and butternut squash salad, a Balinese curry, and a trio of lemon and raspberry based desserts.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Latest to host in Bristol is food critic Daryl Bullock. Darryls other great love is his animals, who make an unexpected appearance during proceedings. Its not long before the evening takes a nose dive when two of the guests stumble across a rather unpleasant surprise left by the cat and are left gagging. Can Darryls pork belly roast save the day, or will the evening end up a complete dogs dinner?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Botox fan Zoe Kellaway hopes to add a bit of sparkle to the competition in Bristol with her `Pretty in Pink themed dinner party. Zoe is cooking a predominantly pink menu, including beetroot risotto, and enlists the help of a butler to wear pink hot pants while serving cocktails on arrival. With exploding desserts and plenty of flesh on show, will Zoe succeed in cheering her guests up with her fun theme?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the last day of the competition in Bristol, and the turn of highly competitive Andy Wright. Andy is confident that his black-tie dinner party theme and palatial Victorian flat will bag him the cash. He has lined up a glamorous night of champagne, caviar, canapes and candlelight. However, chaos soon descends when Andy burns the nut roast and then loses his star ingredient for the dessert.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Mark and Caroline want a bolthole on Spains stunning Orihuela Costa that works for all the family and is close to the golf courses. Scarlette Douglas shows them what their £100k can buy.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Sandra and Gary cant wait to find their dream holiday home on Spains Costa Cálida... despite never having been there before!

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off

programme.title: Belle Starr
programme.desc: Belle Starr is the daughter of a Southern aristocrat. When the invading Yankees take over her land, she vows revenge and heads to Missouri where she marries Confederate outlaw Sam Starr, and joins him and his gang in harrying the occupying troops. In fact, the real Belle Starr was a simple outlaw who, with her Cherokee husband, used the opportunity of the confusion of war to line their own pockets.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica is approached by her old friend Dorian Beecher, a shy poet, who begs her to help him. Dorian wants her to impersonate his mum in order to impress his boss, the father of his true love Sarah. Jessica learns that Dorian has been ridiculed for claiming to have seen a headless horseman on his previous visits to Sarahs house, and when his chief tormentor is found decapitated, Dorian is the prime suspect.

programme.title: Columbo
programme.desc: The gala opening of `Song and Dance, a `Thats Entertainment! type compilation of memorable numbers from classic musical films, stirs the comeback hopes of one-time screen queen Grace Wheeler.

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.desc: The surprising story of how Britain entered a new age of steam railways after the Second World War and why it quickly came to an end. After the war, the largely-destroyed railways of Europe were rebuilt to carry more modern diesel and electric trains. Britain, however, chose to build thousands of brand new steam locomotives. Did we stay with steam because coal was seen as the most reliable power source or were the railways run by men who couldnt bear to let go of their beloved steam trains?

programme.title: Great Railway Journeys
programme.sub-title: Crewe to Crewe With Victoria Wood
programme.desc: Victoria Wood makes a round trip to the north of Britain from Crewe, taking in both the east and west coasts. On her way north she visits Carnforth station, location of the classic film `Brief Encounter, takes the North West Regional Railways service across Morecambe Bay to Barrow and the Cumbrian Coastal line to Carlisle before reaching Thurso, the most northerly point possible by train.

programme.title: London to Brighton Side by Side
programme.desc: In 1953 the BBC made a point-of-view film from the London to Brighton train. In 1983 they did the same again. This is a film made of both runs at once with every bridge, siding, tunnel and station running side by side in unlikely synchronisation.

programme.title: Great Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Palin, a keen train spotter when young, fulfils his boyhood dream of travelling length of the country from Euston to Kyle of Lochalsh.

programme.title: Phil Davis Remembers...The Firm
programme.desc: Phil Davis pays tribute to maverick film director Alan Clarke as he looks back on his time filming the 1989 made-for-television film The Firm. Phil recalls how he was cast in the role as the sleek, villainous Yeti and how excited he was to work on this powerful and subversive film about football hooliganism.

programme.title: Screen Two
programme.desc: Drama about Bex, an estate agent with an apparently respectable family life who is also a football hooligan leading of a vicious firm of thugs who are determined to lead a national hooligan assault on Europe.

programme.title: Why the Industrial Revolution Happened Here
programme.desc: Professor Jeremy Black examines one of the most extraordinary and revolutionary periods in British history: the Industrial Revolution. He explains the unique economic, social and political conditions that by the 19th century, led to Britain becoming the richest, most powerful nation on the planet. It was a time that transformed the way people think, work and play forever.

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.desc: The surprising story of how Britain entered a new age of steam railways after the Second World War and why it quickly came to an end. After the war, the largely-destroyed railways of Europe were rebuilt to carry more modern diesel and electric trains. Britain, however, chose to build thousands of brand new steam locomotives. Did we stay with steam because coal was seen as the most reliable power source or were the railways run by men who couldnt bear to let go of their beloved steam trains?

programme.title: Great Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Palin, a keen train spotter when young, fulfils his boyhood dream of travelling length of the country from Euston to Kyle of Lochalsh.

programme.title: Britains Lost Masterpieces
programme.desc: Bendor Grosvenor and Emma Dabiri visit Brighton Museum to investigate who painted two neglected pictures of religious subjects. Bendor believes a grubby image of Mary Magdalene repenting her sins may be by a forgotten master of Francesco Trevisani.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: The action on day five of the World Athletics Championships reaches its conclusion, and after springing a surprise to win gold in Budapest two years ago, Great Britains Josh Kerr is back to defend his 1500m title. It wont be easy with competition coming from a strong American contingent and Norways Jakob Ingebrigtsen, if he can prove his fitness.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton helps an aspiring writer who wants to make a dramatic relocation from the frenetic bustle of East London to the rural idylls of Dumfries and Galloway in Scotland. With a budget of £300,000, hes got his sights set on somewhere isolated that will inspire his creativity. Away from the houses, Alistair heads for the hills hoping to strike it lucky on a Scottish gold rush.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Izzie uncovers valuable jewellery, and JJ restores scientific equipment. Money raised at auction will help a man, forced into early retirement, ignite a new passion in his garage.

programme.desc: Three couples face a series of 50/50 questions which hurtle The Answer Run down towards them. Across three rounds, the couples build up their cash pots, but only one pair can face The Final Run and win the chance to take home their cash prize.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Football
programme.desc: Gabby Logan presents highlights from the opening match day of the 2025/26 Champions League. Six-time winners Liverpool take on Atletico Madrid at Anfield, and Chelsea return to the scene of their first European Cup triumph when they play Bayern Munich at the Allianz Arena. Tottenham open their campaign against Villarreal, and last seasons semi-finalists Arsenal travel to Bilbao to face Athletic Club. Holders PSG begin their title defence against Atalanta in Paris.

programme.title: The Aftermath
programme.desc: During the bitter winter of 1946, Rachael Morgan arrives in the ruins of Hamburg and is reunited with her husband Lewis, a British colonel overseeing the citys reconstruction. But Rachael is shocked to find that her new home, a grand old house, will be shared with its previous owners: a German widower and his daughter. With the war only just over, the atmosphere is charged with anger and grief that give way to passion and betrayal.

Elsewhere, Jules comes across an unlikely centre of manufacturing nestled in the countys rural countryside.

programme.title: WA World Athletics Championships
programme.desc: Can Josh Kerr defend the 1,500m world title he claimed in Budapest two years ago? Sarah Mulkerrins present highlights of all the track and field action from the Athletics World Championships in Tokyo, with that 1,500m final the climax of a packed day 5. Great Britains Molly Caudery has a great chance of getting amongst the medals in the womens pole vault as well, and world champions will be crowned in the mens long jump and womens 3,000m steeplechase.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: After being invited to a bar crawl on Khaosan Road, Zara gets under the skin of Bangkoks notorious red light district, Soi Cowboy - but filming is swiftly shut down by local bar owners and the police. When Zara meets Mike Yu, a young British expat living a life of luxury in the Thai capital, she realises theres more to the city than meets the eye. Meanwhile, a visit to the Bangkok Immigration Detention Centre exposes how easy it is to get caught on the wrong side of the law in Thailand.

programme.title: Thailand: The Dark Side of Paradise
programme.desc: In Asias sex capital, Pattaya, Zara meets British men chasing cheap thrills, before heading to Ko Phangan, an exotic island famed for its spirituality and beauty.

programme.desc: After a wild and crazy night at Ko Phangans Full Moon Party, Zara travels to Phuket and experiences a taste of Thailands luxury lifestyle.

programme.desc: In this English heat, the all-female Diva Drivers from Leicestershire are determined to outmanoeuvre Somersets Checkshirt Choppers and win a place in the semi-final. programme.title: The Fast and the Farmer-ish
programme.desc: In the Welsh heat, two teams of young farmers from south west Wales put their reputations as skilled drivers on the line. Its the West Wales Cowboys versus the Chipmunks, and both teams are determined to fly the flag for their nation in the semi-finals. Hosted by full-time farmer and YouTuber Tom Pemberton, the show sees both teams go head-to-head in three spectacular, high-octane agricultural challenges.

programme.desc: After splitting up with Guy, Jamma is now between jobs and sleeping on Winnies sofa. When he unexpectedly sees Guy for the first time in six months, the spark is undeniable. A handsome stranger takes a special interest in their relationship status.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy is double-booked himself, so he asks Jamma to house-sit and let the builder in. Jamma finds Guys manuscript about exes. Isaac comes over to calm Jamma down. Farida arrives with divorce papers and a new showbiz career to show off about.

programme.title: Angels of the North
programme.sub-title: Big Tyne: I cannae cos the child locks on
programme.desc: Sammyjo enlists the Longlox girls help as she makes plans for her and Garys first anniversary. Meanwhile, piercer Carmen wants to pierce below the waist.

programme.title: Angels of the North
programme.sub-title: Big Tyne: I looked like Phil Mitchell til I was about three
programme.desc: Shane starts preparing for life as an uncle as Jades baby bump grows. Carmen gets disappointing news about her piercing plans.

programme.title: The Fast and the Farmer-ish
programme.desc: In this English heat, the all-female Diva Drivers from Leicestershire are determined to outmanoeuvre Somersets Checkshirt Choppers and win a place in the semi-final. Farmer and YouTuber Tom Pemberton hosts as the teams go head-to-head in three high-octane agricultural challenges. From tractor racing through a muddy bog to negotiating an obstacle course while singing their favourite karaoke tracks and demolishing sheds in a radical ten-pin tractor bowling game.

programme.title: The Fast and the Farmer-ish
programme.desc: In the Welsh heat, two teams of young farmers from south west Wales put their reputations as skilled drivers on the line. Its the West Wales Cowboys versus the Chipmunks, and both teams are determined to fly the flag for their nation in the semi-finals. Hosted by full-time farmer and YouTuber Tom Pemberton, the show sees both teams go head-to-head in three spectacular, high-octane agricultural challenges.

programme.title: This Is BBC THREE
programme.desc: BBC THREE: Refreshing TV for the digital age. Tune in daily from 7.00pm.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Knockout week continues as the second group of eight hopefuls return to take on the competition. Those who show they mean business will earn the right to work in their first professional kitchen.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: A couple with four children searches for outdoor adventures and fresh air in North Yorkshire, where Briony May Williams helps them find a family home with room to spread their wings.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: A huge 300-year-old mill has become a dumping ground for treasures and valuable heirlooms. A couple need to sell inherited items to fund the restoration of their beautiful home.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: After being brutally double-crossed by fellow Traitor Harry Clark, Paul Gorton is taking a second swipe at his rival - this time on the hunt to get one up in the world of antiques.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: The World Athletics Championships reaches its half way stage, with Noah Lyles and Shericka Jackson returning to defend the titles they won in Budapest 2023 in the heats of the 200m. The womens pole vault final gets underway in Tokyo, with Great Britains Molly Caudery hoping to make up for her Olympic disappointment in Paris 2024. Meanwhile, the 400m hurdles reach the semi-final stage, the mens long jump final gets underway.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Dave Myers and Si King explore our national love of picnics. With their unique banter and camaraderie, the duo create their ultimate al fresco lunch at Beaufort Polo Club; find out how our summer obsession evolved; celebrate picnic classics such as the cornish pasty and the scotch egg; bake a luxurious Dundee cake, and make a country terrine that would play centre stage in any outdoor feast.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Jason Manford hosts the quiz show where players face a question and pick from a board of six rankable answers. Some answers are good, but only one is unbeatable.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The three talented chefs from central England are halfway through their heat, and the pressure is mounting. Once again, they each serve a unique take on the brief celebrating the Olympic and Paralympic Games.

programme.title: Worlds Sneakiest Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham meets the animals using devious tactics and sneaky tricks to survive. New, groundbreaking science reveals astonishing visual trickery, from illusionist zebras to vanishing geckos and shape-shifting cuttlefish.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The show comes from Hulls City Hall, East Yorkshire. Antique experts Caroline Hawley and David Harper are on hand to find a selection of objects to take to auction. Caroline uncovers a remarkable collection of suffragette postcards, and David is delighted by some Hull Daily Mail newspaper printing blocks, saved from the tip.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Every day this week, former winners Tim Key, Jamie Laing, Sunetra Sarker and Laura Whitmore take on a series of quiz rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos railway adventure along the north and south coasts of the English Channel resumes in Dover, where he recalls the biggest evacuation in military history.

programme.title: SOS: Extreme Rescues
programme.desc: A paraglider with vertigo is stuck in the snow on Crib Goch, emergency teams rush to rescue a dog walker caught by flooding, and a cry for help that could be a person, or a goat.

programme.title: Grand Tours of Scotlands Rivers
programme.desc: The River Irvine in Ayrshire is a hidden gem. From its source close to Loudoun Hill, Paul follows the river through ancient battle fields and discovers a legacy of lacemaking and a treasure trove of gemstones along its banks.

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Travelling east, Alice discovers a Roman barn conversion, unearths a Tudor fort and finds intricately carved 10,000-year-old weapons.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the wilderness of Patagonia at the foot of the South American continent. Simons journey takes him up to the huge South Patagonian ice field, through the foothills of the Andes towards the great Grey Glacier of Chile.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Unspun World with John Simpson
programme.desc: John Simpson brings his expertise to bear on the most important stories. In discussion with the BBCs range of experts across the world, he uses their unique local knowledge to go beyond the headlines to get to the unspun truth about the world.

programme.title: Twiggy
programme.desc: A portrait of International supermodel, actor, singer and iconic British figure, Twiggy.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: Its the semi-final of the Great British Sewing Bee, and three challenges stand between the sewers and the final: plus fours, polo shirts and 1920s-inspired party outfits.

programme.title: Disaster at Sea: The Piper Alpha Story
programme.desc: With Piper Alpha gone, survivors evidence becomes key to the truth. The inquiry reveals fatal errors, ignored warnings and failed systems. Will there be justice?

programme.title: Stranded on Honeymoon Island
programme.desc: A crate containing the couples mobile phones washes ashore, revealing more than anyone bargained for. David drops a bombshell to Ini, causing shockwaves at the Couples Cove. And when night falls, Film Fest serves up some even bigger surprises for the honeymooners.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: Knockout week comes to a head with just ten cooks remaining in the competition. Success could mean a place in the semi-finals, but it will take every ounce of effort to get there.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martel is on home turf in Dundee, and she couldnt be any happier! Dion is looking around a vast house in Merseyside. In Plymouth, Tommy loves the period features on offer.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers
programme.desc: Izzie uncovers valuable jewellery, and JJ restores scientific equipment. Money raised at auction will help a man, forced into early retirement, ignite a new passion in his garage.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Monty is harvesting sweetcorn. Toby visits a magical garden in Wiltshire. Frances is in a Cornish village to find out how pioneering technology is creating beautiful borders for pollinators. A self-taught grower is transforming her allotment.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: WA World Championship Athletics LIVE
programme.desc: Day six gets underway at the Athletics World Championships in Tokyo with a first glimpse of Great Britains Olympic star Keely Hodgkinson. The 2024 BBC Sports Personality of the Year has struggled through an injury-hit season but is the favourite for gold after running the fastest time in the world in August.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Without doubt, a huge influence over modern British cuisine are the flavours of the Mediterranean. Brought at first by the Romans and more recently by hordes of holidaymakers returning from the sun, the range of dishes and ingredients we have adopted from the Med are now commonplace on our menus and in our homes. Dave Myers and Si King look at how this has evolved and create their favourite dishes.

programme.title: Unbeatable

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The two highest scoring chefs from Scotland must go head-to-head and cook their six-course menus again. They need to impress a panel of exacting judges.

programme.title: Worlds Sneakiest Animals
programme.desc: Chris Packham meets a host of animals that use deceptive tactics to find food. New science reveals that some trick their prey, like the manipulative mantis that looks like a flower and killer whales that set traps using sound. Others cheat each other - sea otters demand ransoms after kidnapping each others pups.

programme.title: Flog It!

programme.desc: Texan supermodel Jerry Hall and psychotherapist Philippa Perry take to the road in a gigantic 1970s Buick. Squeezing through the narrowest of country lanes, the celebrities are advised and assisted by antique experts Tim Medhurst and Charles Hanson.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: A kayaker has called a mayday after getting into trouble; although hes able to communicate via his VHF radio, its a race against time to find him.

programme.desc: The story of a giant otter cub, who was rescued and is being raised by Brazilian naturalist Carolina Vargas. Sancho has to be bottle-fed, shown how to catch fish, and taught to outsmart the many predators of the Pantanal, the worlds biggest wetland.

programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: In the wake of the pandemic, Mike and Kristin are forced to make some tough business decisions involving Outdoor Man; Jen helps Mandy get organised.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mikes willpower is put to the test when Vanessa challenges him to go vegetarian for a week; Ed trolls ventriloquist Jeff Dunham on social media; Mandy and Kyle move into Kristin and Ryans guest house.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray Barones life seems perfect: hes a successful sportswriter living with his wife Debra and three kids, but trouble comes in paradise in the shape of his interfering mother, grumpy father and resentful brother. In this opening episode of the series, Debra wants a peaceful birthday with Ray, so he tells his parents and brother that theres no party: a lie with embarrassing consequences.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra is angered when Rays problem with showing affection for her becomes a family matter.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Ray hopes the family-themed eulogy he gives for his Uncle Gus will extinguish the sparks of a festering family feud.

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert administers IQ tests to Ray and Debra and then tests their reactions to false results.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe finds a police officers badge and goes on a spree of arrests until she meets up with the owner, while Joey wonders if he is in love with Monica.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Inadvertent Kiss
programme.desc: Rachel has an interview for her dream job at Ralph Lauren. All goes well until she inadvertently kisses the interviewer, and at the second interview she mistakenly berates him for his `sexual intentions. Meanwhile, Monica competes to have a better relationship than Phoebes, and Joey is arrested for stalking a sexy neighbour with whom Ross gets a date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachels new boss and colleague both smoke. When Rachel discovers that they make business decisions without her in the smoking room, she pretends to be a serious smoker so she can be part of the discussion. Meanwhile, Rosss son and Joey audition for the same commercial, but only one of them can get the part.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Cant Flirt
programme.desc: Ross really likes the pretty pizza-delivery woman, but his flirting technique is awful. Meanwhile, a nasty surprise awaits Joey when he tells everyone about his big television appearance.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Ride Along
programme.desc: The gang persuade Phoebes policeman boyfriend to let them ride in his police car. The friends enjoy the experience, until a gunshot rings out. Elsewhere, Rachel overhears a telephone message for Ross from his second ex-wife.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: After Gary confides in Monica that he intends to ask Phoebe to move in with him, Monica immediately breaks her promise to him and tells Phoebe, who worries that it is too early in the relationship. She persuades Chandler to talk to Gary, hoping that Chandlers fear of commitment will rub off on him, but Garys enthusiasm overwhelms even Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Joeys Big Break
programme.desc: Joeys first major film role leads to an unexpected experience in Las Vegas. Meanwhile, Phoebe cant quite remember why she hates Ross.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang travel to Las Vegas, Nevada, where more than one surprise awaits them. After Ross misinterprets Rachels actions, a war of public humiliation results.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang are having fun in Las Vegas, where Monica and Chandler get lucky, Rachel makes Ross regret playing a prank on her, and Joey schemes for fame and fortune.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Ross cant figure out if theyre legally married, and Monica and Chandler search for matrimonial signs.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Hugs Rachel
programme.desc: Joey is upset to learn that Chandler plans to move out to live with Monica, but Rachel seems strangely unaffected by the news. Meanwhile, Phoebe pleads with Ross to either get an annulment or admit that he still loves Rachel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler disagree over how to redecorate Rachels old room, and despite Phoebes admonitions, Ross makes a drastic decision about Rachel.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance
programme.desc: After learning that his health insurance has lapsed because he has not worked enough as an actor, Joey suffers a painful hernia, and Rachel finally finds out that Ross never annulled their marriage.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel forces Ross to terminate their marriage, Phoebes first triplet babysitting experience proves stressful, and Joey pretends to own a German sports car.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One on the Last Night
programme.desc: Its the last night before Chandler moves into Monicas apartment, leaving Joey alone and prompting Rachel to make plans to move in with Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes lack of coordination while jogging embarrasses Rachel, and Joey gets a sexy new roommate.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The next stop on Bradley and Barney Walshs European road trip is Switzerland. They take in the breath-taking views with a ride on a mountain rollercoaster, before exercising their vocal chords when they try the Swiss tradition of yodeling. The following day, Barney arranges a unique way for them to enjoy some local cheese, and then drive to the Contra Dam, where Barney reveals they are about to attempt one of James Bonds most iconic stunts, a petrifying 220 metre-high bungee jump.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The father and son have reached Slovenia, a country that loves its sport. Brads passion for bikes gives Barney an excuse to take his dad motocross racing. After hearing that one in 200 people in Slovenia is a beekeeper, they make a stop to meet one.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Stand up comic and presenter Jimmy Carr is back to oversee the disputes and deliberations on all the topical events that set the great British publics chins wagging. Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious. The first guests are British boxing sensation Amir Khan, `The IT Crowds Richard Ayoade, as well as comics Holly Walsh and Josh Widdicombe.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious, and are joined by Sarah Millican, Joe Wilkinson, Nick Grimshaw and Ollie Locke from `Made in Chelsea.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Katherine Ryan, Layton Williams and Amy Gledhill
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Katherine Ryan, Layton Williams and Amy Gledhill to rip into internet nonsense, incl. bizarre cleaning hacks, drama-filled comment sections and viral disasters. (S1, E03)

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Hollywood director Colin tackles a `Spiderman bank heist scene using unashamed nudity, Elvis impressions and catwalk model poses. Guest starring Lauren Cohan from `The Walking Dead.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Americas legendary show featuring four performers who improvise characters, sketches and songs prompted by suggestions from the audience.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of four elementary school boys.

programme.title: Jonathan Pie: Back to the Studio
programme.desc: The irate news reporter comes to the Hammersmith Apollo for a night of political stand-up. A frustrated news journalist best known for venting his spleen in `off-camera rants, this show sees him attacking both sides of the political divide.

programme.desc: After learning that his health insurance has lapsed because he has not worked enough as an actor, Joey suffers a painful hernia, and Rachel finally finds out that Ross never annulled their marriage.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel forces Ross to terminate their marriage, Phoebes first triplet babysitting experience proves stressful, and Joey pretends to own a German sports car.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One on the Last Night
programme.desc: Its the last night before Chandler moves into Monicas apartment, leaving Joey alone and prompting Rachel to make plans to move in with Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes lack of coordination while jogging embarrasses Rachel, and Joey gets a sexy new roommate.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The next stop on Bradley and Barney Walshs European road trip is Switzerland. They take in the breath-taking views with a ride on a mountain rollercoaster, before exercising their vocal chords when they try the Swiss tradition of yodeling. The following day, Barney arranges a unique way for them to enjoy some local cheese, and then drive to the Contra Dam, where Barney reveals they are about to attempt one of James Bonds most iconic stunts, a petrifying 220 metre-high bungee jump.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The father and son have reached Slovenia, a country that loves its sport. Brads passion for bikes gives Barney an excuse to take his dad motocross racing. After hearing that one in 200 people in Slovenia is a beekeeper, they make a stop to meet one.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Stand up comic and presenter Jimmy Carr is back to oversee the disputes and deliberations on all the topical events that set the great British publics chins wagging. Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious. The first guests are British boxing sensation Amir Khan, `The IT Crowds Richard Ayoade, as well as comics Holly Walsh and Josh Widdicombe.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats
programme.desc: Team captains Sean Lock and Jon Richardson thrash out the hot stories of the week, from the silly to the serious, and are joined by Sarah Millican, Joe Wilkinson, Nick Grimshaw and Ollie Locke from `Made in Chelsea.

programme.title: Iain Stirlings Roast The Internet
programme.sub-title: Katherine Ryan, Layton Williams and Amy Gledhill
programme.desc: ...Internet. Iain is joined by Katherine Ryan, Layton Williams and Amy Gledhill to rip into internet nonsense, incl. bizarre cleaning hacks, drama-filled comment sections and viral disasters. (S1, E03)

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Hollywood director Colin tackles a `Spiderman bank heist scene using unashamed nudity, Elvis impressions and catwalk model poses. Guest starring Lauren Cohan from `The Walking Dead.

programme.title: Whose Line Is It Anyway? USA
programme.desc: Americas legendary show featuring four performers who improvise characters, sketches and songs prompted by suggestions from the audience.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The off-colour adventures of four elementary school boys.

programme.title: Jonathan Pie: Back to the Studio
programme.desc: The irate news reporter comes to the Hammersmith Apollo for a night of political stand-up. A frustrated news journalist best known for venting his spleen in `off-camera rants, this show sees him attacking both sides of the political divide.

programme.title: The Daily Show
programme.desc: A satirical look at news, trends, pop culture, current events, politics, sports, and entertainment.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: John Dronenberg and Justin Essian try to fly volatile propane to a fishing lodge, Luke Hickerson battles failing equipment and Ponts challenges Ariel to make the perfect landing.

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Sarah Fraher has her first flight in a 208, Ariel hunts for seagull eggs, and Erik Snuggerud fights to keep his plane in the sky over one of Alaskas most notorious runways.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: Four gold dredges and their driven but eccentric crews risk everything to hunt for gold on the bottom of the frigid Bering Sea before winter sets in. They rely on custom-built rigs, some barely seaworthy, for their perilous journeys.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen

programme.title: Hoffman Family Gold

programme.title: Mega Shippers
programme.desc: An airplane is ready for assembly in Alabama, but several parts need to arrive from all over the globe. A rare three-wheeled sports car, and more logistical headaches trying to stow £100million worth of super yachts onto a vessel carrier.

programme.title: In the Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Groundbreaking storytelling techniques reveal the high-stakes drama that unfolds at the epicenter of recent natural disasters, as told through firsthand accounts and mobile phone footage filmed by everyday people caught in the eye of the storm.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Mystery at Blind Frog Ranch
programme.desc: Chad makes a huge mistake, derailing the operation to drag the box out of the cavern. But when they pull out some of the boxs contents, they are shocked by what they discover.

programme.desc: Paul tries to stifle his feelings for Grayson. Diane struggles to put Billy behind her, and Marlon catches Eli smuggling stolen goods into the house.

Meanwhile, Al acts on some relationship advice from Bert but things go from bad to worse with Pauline.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Martin expresses some negative views when Louisa reveals she will be interviewing for the headteachers job and Pauline worries that something is up when Al behaves in a secretive manner, and is later seen semi-naked in Louisas home. programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Rumours are rife about Martins plans to leave Portwenn and take up a surgeons job in London. programme.title: Doc Martin

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland Deschain, the last Gunslinger, must prevent the Man in Black from toppling the Dark Tower, the key that holds the universe together.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The girls are on the hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBIs Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want.

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as theyre pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venoms home world.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the God of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.desc: When evil spirit Pitch and his army of nightmares come to Earth, the Guardians must protect the children of the world while they sleep. Pitch is powerful, so they need help from a reluctant new team member: the impish spirit of winter, Jack Frost.

programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.desc: A dragon, an orphaned boy, and a mountain spirit work together as they trek through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania

programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Open Season 2
programme.desc: Elliots way to his wedding with Giselle gets longer when Mr Weenie is kidnapped by a group of pampered pets determined to return him to his owners.

programme.title: Piece by Piece
programme.desc: LEGO bricks tell the life story of singer/songwriter and record producer Pharrell Williams -- from his childhood in Virginia to his success in the music and fashion industry.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: When evil spirit Pitch and his army of nightmares come to Earth, the Guardians must protect the children of the world while they sleep. Pitch is powerful, so they need help from a reluctant new team member: the impish spirit of winter, Jack Frost.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A dragon, an orphaned boy, and a mountain spirit work together as they trek through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Open Season 3
programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure With Scientists
programme.desc: An inept swashbuckler decides to make an attempt to win the Pirate of the Year Award, and beat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz in a race to plunder the most booty. His journey takes him to Victorian London where the Pirate Captain must choose between winning Pirate of the Year, or helping his crew.

programme.title: Little Vampire

programme.title: Buffalo Kids

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Armys New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Reginas ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Geeky high schooler Napoleon fancies quiet Deb but cant ask her to the prom. His brother Kip has an online relationship and dreams of being a cage fighter, while his uncle Rico is more interested in his mail-order time-travel machine. Napoleons mission is to help his friend Pedro win the student presidency from the nasty Summer.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious teen incurs the wrath of a beloved clergyman by challenging the towns ban on loud music and dancing.

programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property, 16-year-old Claudia finds her sheltered world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears in her garden, and the pair find a connection they both need.

programme.title: Mirandas Victim
programme.desc: In 1963, 18-year-old Patricia Weir is kidnapped and brutally raped. Committed to putting her attacker, Ernesto Miranda, in prison, Trishs life is destroyed by Americas legal system as she triggers a law that transforms the nation.

programme.title: Sunset Boulevard
programme.desc: A bankrupt screenwriter is drawn into the decaying, unstable world of a forgotten silent movie star. Oscar-winning satire of Hollywoods move to talking pictures with stand-out performances from Swanson and von Stroheim.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: The Danish Girl
programme.desc: Artist Einar Wegener travels to Germany to undergo one of the first sex-change operations that took place over the course of 2 years.

programme.title: My First Summer
programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property, 16-year-old Claudia finds her sheltered world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears in her garden, and the pair find a connection they both need.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her M?ori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: Save The Cinema
programme.desc: Sky Original film following Welsh hairdresser Liz Evans fight to save her small towns theatre. Poignant British drama based on a true story starring Samantha Morton.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the childrens story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: The Mountain

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Following another successful mission, International Rescue faces a crisis when its space station, Thunderbird 5, is damaged by a suspected meteor strike. However, criminal mastermind Aristotle Spode, aka the Hood, is waiting for the team to vacate their secret island base so that he can take control and learn more about their operation.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before DArtagnans very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: Chicago teen Ren and his family move to the small midwestern town of Bomont, where rock music has been banned.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Flashdance
programme.desc: A young female welder dreams of becoming a professional dancer and struggles against all the odds to realise her dream. However, in her effort to succeed, she discovers that getting to the top is far from easy. Giorgio Moroders composition `Flashdance (What a Feeling), sung by Irene Cara, won an Academy Award for Best Original Song.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A Madison Avenue photographer transforms a timid saleswoman into one of the fashion worlds most glamorous models. The Gershwin-scored film includes `How Long Has This Been Going On?, He Loves and She Loves, and `S Wonderful.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: The story of a pair of blues musicians who try to raise the money to save an orphanage by reuniting their old band - nearly writing off Chicago in the process.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: Grease 2

programme.title: The Blues Brothers

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: British POWs are ordered by their Japanese captors to construct a bridge of strategic importance and are happy to sabotage and delay the progress until their commanding officers orders them to continue the work unhindered to its completion, but are his actions tantamount to collaborating with the enemy?

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent-turned-bodyguard finds danger and romance while protecting an entertainer from a stalker.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJs sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the mans quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the God of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Aeon lives in a world restricted to the last city on Earth, after a plague has destroyed the rest of the world. The city is ruled by a council and its chairman, and people are mysteriously disappearing. Aeon is an assassin for an underground group of rebels called the Monicans, and is assigned to remove the Chairman, but at the last minute she finds herself unable to do it.

programme.title: Ferris Buellers Day Off
programme.desc: A teen perpetrates a series of elaborate deceptions to ensure that he and two friends spend a carefree day in Chicago.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: To clear his criminal record a former LA cop must infiltrate the Miami street-racing scene to set up a drug baron. Burning rubber all over the city with his ex-con friend, he attempts to deliver the crook to the FBI without crashing and being blown to pieces in one of the many explosions.

programme.title: Dallas Buyers Club
programme.desc: Learning that he has AIDS, Ron Woodroof smuggles medicine into the United States to fight the disease.

programme.title: Gladiator II
programme.desc: Lucius must enter the Colosseum after the powerful emperors of Rome conquer his home. With rage in his heart and the future of the empire at stake, he looks to the past to find the strength and honour needed to return the glory of Rome to its people.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a group of Allied POWs who engineered a bold escape from a Nazi camp during World War II. The escape committees plan is to liberate hundreds of inmates and cause havoc throughout occupied territory, but their problems include concealing three tunnels from the guards and disposing of numerous tons of soil.

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: Socialite Melanie follows a handsome lawyer back to his coastal home. She is menaced by birds on the road and has to take cover as the aerial attacks intensify. Based on Daphne du Mauriers story.

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: Tormented by personal demons, Ralphie encounters a mysterious organization of men who welcome him as one of their own. As he struggles to define himself, pressure mounts and a powder keg is lit as he blows a hole in the lives of everyone he touches.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: After responding to an emergency call from a mysterious woman, a young locksmith gets unwittingly caught in the crosshairs of a ruthless mob boss.

programme.title: Into the Wonderwoods
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Angelo, an aspiring explorer, is left behind by his distracted parents at a rest stop. He then ventures into a forest inhabited by strange, wonderful creatures to find them.

programme.title: The Prosecutor
programme.desc: A poor young man is wrongly charged with drug trafficking after being deceived. An ex-prosecutor investigates the case, uncovers a corrupt lawyer teams scheme, and restores justice despite obstruction from evil forces.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid A.I.s attempt at winning a grieving widows heart puts it in the path of a government agent trying to stop the rise of machine consciousness.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguistics professor leads an elite team of investigators in a race against time to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: Friends unwittingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate, racing against death to escape the future foretold in their readings.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: Reuniting after the tragic death of their friend, four college friends set out to hike through the Scandinavian wilderness. But a wrong turn leads them into the mysterious forests of Norse legend, where an ancient evil stalks them at every turn.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguistics professor leads an elite team of investigators in a race against time to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.
