programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Its the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills arent paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower mans mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid A.I.s attempt at winning a grieving widows heart puts it in the path of a government agent trying to stop the rise of machine consciousness.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguistics professor leads an elite team of investigators in a race against time to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the orders unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.desc: An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Insidious
programme.desc: Parents take drastic measures when it seems their new home is haunted and their comatose son is possessed by a malevolent entity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: The Lamberts believe that they have defeated the spirits that haunted their family, but they soon discover that evil is not beaten so easily.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Tarot
programme.desc: Friends unwittingly unleash an unspeakable evil trapped within a cursed deck of tarot cards. One by one, they come face to face with fate, racing against death to escape the future foretold in their readings.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: Reuniting after the tragic death of their friend, four college friends set out to hike through the Scandinavian wilderness. But a wrong turn leads them into the mysterious forests of Norse legend, where an ancient evil stalks them at every turn.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguistics professor leads an elite team of investigators in a race against time to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place: Day One
programme.desc: When New York City comes under attack from an alien invasion, a woman and other survivors try to find a way to safety. They soon learn that they must remain absolutely silent as the mysterious creatures are drawn to the slightest sound.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror.uk
programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker finds a clue that might help him understand why his parents disappeared when he was young. His path puts him on a collision course with Dr. Curt Connors, his fathers former partner.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The emergence of a powerful new villain and the return of an old friend bring Peter Parker to the realization that all his enemies have one thing in common: Oscorp. Based on Marvel Comics characters.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: When a new student joins her colleges female a cappella group, she takes the women out of their comfort zone of traditional pieces and introduces them to innovative arrangements.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: Now graduating seniors, the Barden Bellas enter an international a cappella competition which no American team has ever won.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart. But when they get the chance to reunite for an overseas USO tour, this group of awesome nerds will come together to make some music one last time.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Leopoldo the Llama
programme.desc: Leopoldo is fed up at always having to play everybody elses choice of games. He decides to climb a mountain on his own as nobody else wants to come with him. Everyone soon realised that perhaps it is more fun doing things with your friends after all.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Zed The Hero of Africa
programme.desc: The volcano is threatening to erupt but the animals are reluctant to leave their beautiful savannah home. Can anybody come to the rescue?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the End of the Rainy Season
programme.desc: It is the end of the rainy season and Patsy the porcupine will soon be arriving to tidy up the savannah. The animals are busy having a clearout, except for Herbert the warthog who cannot bring himself to throw anything away. When he cannot find his musical rocks for the concert that night he is encouraged by Doris the duck to have a clearout.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Flamingo Festival
programme.desc: Pauline the pelican is looking forward to the Flamingo Festival on Waterlily Lake and excited to hear that Isobel is this years Flamingo Queen. She loves to watch the flamingoes practising their dance, and secretly copies their moves. When Isobel hurts herself, everybody is worried that the Flamingo Festival will have to be cancelled. That is, until a surprising understudy steps in to take Isobels place.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Whale Trip
programme.desc: The puffins of Mossy Bay are excited to be going on a whale trip with Hercule Moustache. Hercule points out all manner of sights and sounds as they ride on Thelma the whale, but the boisterous puffins dont always listen to Hercule, and frequently interrupt the poor walrus. The puffins soon learn how important it is to listen to your elders when out on a trip.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jimjameree Tree
programme.desc: Joey the kangaroo and his friends all love to play by the jimjamaree tree. They are devastated when the tree is struck by lightning in a big storm. Together with Wally Two Trees they do everything they can to ensure their favourite tree comes back to life, with magical results.

programme.desc: Simon and Lou are at the park playing basketball, but they cant reach the hoop with the ball. Its too high, or maybe its that theyre too small. What they need is to be able to grow tall right away.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon and Gaspard are playing in the garden, but it looks like a storm is brewing. Mom tells them to come inside just when the storm bursts. Mom tells Gaspard that there is nothing to fear once inside the house, but he is not so sure.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Grandpa has planted seeds, so he can grow strawberries as sweet and succulent as candy. The children are already licking their lips. A blackbird is flying circles around the seeds and the kids have to chase it away.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: At school, its the end of year costume show. Simon is dressed as an elephant, Lou is a dragon. All the parents are there, and Lou is getting nervous. So when she cant find her dragon mask, its like, no way can she go on stage!

programme.desc: Bea and Lexi both lose a tooth. Lexis worried about making mistakes in gymnastics.

programme.title: Clifford

programme.title: Clifford

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: When Hudson gets scared during a storm, Clifford and Bailey devise a way to turn the scary sounds into a fun symphony of music.

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Clifford decides to create a K9 Safety Patrol Unit, but struggles to find the balance between safety and fun!

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Ms Ellerby gets help from Emily Elizabeth, Clifford and his friends getting the beach ready for a storm.

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Emily Elizabeth, Samantha, Pablo, and Jack turn a cardboard box into a fort, and its the perfect place to play!

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: When Emily Elizabeth predicts that Clifford will lose something, he gets so worried about his future that he can no longer enjoy the present!

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah offer to do the polishing so that Madame Au Lait can make their favourite fruity trifle. While she is out buying the ingredients, the twins go polish crazy, thinking that the more they use the happier Madame Au Lait will be and the more trifle she will make. The clockhouse is gleaming when Madame Au Lait returns, but when she sets a hoof on the floor she finds that it as slippery as an ice rink.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to collect McCogginss bell for a town performance. Despite Battersbys warning that the clapper is fragile and doesnt have a spare, Tommy and Tallulah manage to break it. Deciding that they must make a replacement, they look everywhere for something to use and try some very unusual options. Will the bell be ready for Chime Time?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Tommy and Tallulah agree to babysit the spring chicks while Madame Au Lait tends to Mother Chicks hurt wing, they dont realise that how much of a handful the chicks will be. The twins are also taking part in the town kite display today, but somehow the chicks end up surfing on their kite, high in the sky! The twins must stage an airborne rescue before Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are organising McCogginss pile of interesting junk when a vitally important spring goes missing. They cant chime the time without it! The twins chase the spring all over town as it bounces around causing chaos, eventually ending up attaching Pufferty to his kennel. Every time he tries to go somewhere, the spring pulls him back.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: McCoggins tells the twins not to stray far, but they forget to warn Pufferty when they try to teach him how to play hide and seek. There are not many places in Tickety Town big enough to hide a huge dog train, so Pufferty heads far off into the hills. Where can he be? The race is on to find him by Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah find harvesting very slow when they volunteer to pick Lopsiloos vegetables. Surely there must be some way to speed it up? However, when they hit upon the idea of using Pufferty to pull all the vegetables up at once, they are shocked to find that Puffertys carriages unhook and run amok through Tickety Town.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to deliver a precious package to Madame Au Lait and decide that a ride with Pufferty is safest way to transport it. However, when Hopparoo challenges the lovable dog train to a race, the package bounces out of the carriage and embarks upon a crazy journey round Tickety Town, with Tommy and Tallulah in hot pursuit.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. However, in their eagerness to speed things up, they go against his instructions and press the turbo button. Suddenly, the sweeper goes haywire, rampaging through town and sucking up anything in its path, including Madame Au Laits clock key and very nearly Hopparoo too.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of a Long Night in the Jungle
programme.desc: Giggles and Tickles are so excited about their birthday the next day that they vow to stay up all night long so that they dont miss a single moment of it. The other animals on the savannah are tired and soon go to bed. Can the mischievous monkeys find ways to keep themselves awake all night and still enjoy their birthday?

programme.desc: The Zambian bush is a unique and special place. A beautiful Valley, bursting with life. It is home to a rich and diverse array of wildlife and is one of the last remaining strongholds for some of Africas most endangered large carnivores.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans and apes at the worlds biggest sanctuary, Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries
programme.desc: Kenyas growing human population is taking land and resources away from wildlife. The squeeze is creating increasing numbers of conflicts between humans and animals, and is one of the biggest issues in African conservation.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.desc: Wading into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Diving into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visiting a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and more.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys
programme.desc: Japan is going through a seismic crisis after the devastating Tsunami of 2011. We look closely at two very dangerous volcanoes, both are considered to be in the top 5 most dangerous on the planet.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong
programme.desc: Squeezed between South East Asias two most formidable geographical barriers, the Annamite mountains and the Mekong river, lies Khammouane, a rugged landscape with countless caves.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa
programme.desc: Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word oukurubes which means place of thunder in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Coral City
programme.desc: Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.desc: Tyler may have received a wake-up call from the Driscoll Brothers. However, his first day at school provides him with a sudden interest in the works of Thomas Hardy.

programme.title: Hi-De-Hi!
programme.desc: Ex-university professor Jeffrey Fairbrother decides to give the campers a recital of classical music on gramophone records.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Experienced inmate Fletcher, the old hand, gives the benefit of his experience to his green young cell mate, Lennie Godber, and whats extremely important is to know how not to rub up that horrible Mr MacKay the wrong way.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: Mainwaring decides to lift the morale of the troops by giving a platoon dance. When Pike turns up with an ATS girl he intends to wed, emotions begin to run high.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: To bring the right type of crowd into the hotel Basil establishes a Gourmet Night and invites some A-list guests however, in the nature of Fawlty Towers, things dont go as planned.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: Suffering from concussion, Basil ignores hospital advice and returns home to deal tactfully with a party of German tourists.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: The hard-of-hearing Mrs.Richards drives Basil crazy with her complaining especially when a large amount of money is stolen from her room. Basil also must hide his winnings from betting on a horse from his wife.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: A psychiatrist and his wife come to stay and Basil becomes paranoid that Sybil is sharing their intimate details. Meanwhile, a charming guest that Basil loathes has snuck a woman into his room and Basil tries to get proof of that without looking like hes flirting with an attractive Australian guest.

programme.title: Not Going Out
programme.desc: In a desperate bid to prove his manliness, Lee joins Tim, Daisy and Lucy on a camping weekend in the middle of a dark, spooky forest.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his Edwardian Bradshaws guide, Michael Portillo conducts important research in an historic tea room, built by an Edwardian immigrant to the city of York. Research of a more sombre kind leads Michael to the roots of the modern welfare state in the work of an early 20th century Quaker investigator, whose family manufactured chocolate.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo is in the steel city of Sheffield, where he discovers an enormous and beautifully preserved early 20th century steam engine. At 400 tons and packing 12,000 horsepower, it produced armour plate for the most feared warship of the Royal Navy.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos Edwardian railway guide takes him to the city of Liverpool, where King Edward VII had recently laid the foundation stone for a grand Anglican cathedral at the top of St Jamess Mount. The young winner of a competition to design the building was a Roman Catholic from a family of architects. His name was Giles Gilbert Scott.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo braves the fastest zip line in the world, stretching 1,500 feet across a vast slate quarry. He uncovers a bitter industrial dispute between quarrymen and the owner of the pit, Lord Penrhyn, which divided the community at the beginning of the 20th century.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Daves on his way to Grimsby to pick up an iconic 80s fast Ford, the Mk1 Fiesta XR2.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek gets a tour of Hadlow Castle in Kent when he collects an immaculate Citroen that was once used by the Gestapo in occupied France, Dave considers spending his own money on a hay cart, and Paul unearths a remarkably rust-free 1970s Alfa GTV.

programme.title: Rise of the Nazis
programme.desc: Adolf Hitler had been chancellor of Germany for just under a year and it was a challenging balancing act. On the one hand the Nazis had to be be mindful of president Paul von Hindenburg and the vice chancellor Franz von Papen, who were members of Germanys traditional aristocratic and ruling elite.Then, there was the Nazis own power base, the stormtroopers, made up of millions of angry, disenfranchised men who wreaked havoc on the streets of Germany.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: On the legendary Battle of Britain airfield at Biggin Hill, a dedicated team of young engineers restore to flight a Spitfire that fought over Europe in 1944.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visit Barrington Court in Somerset where choice finds include a toy Noahs Ark, an Elizabethan wine jug found in a car boot sale and a collection of ceramic brewery figures that are somewhat the worse for wear.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team return to Barrington Court in Somerset where surprising finds include a revolver believed to have been owned by Wild West showman Buffalo Bill, a rock crystal brooch with magical properties and a mouthwatering collection of old moulds for making chocolate.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Its the pursuit of cute as the team re-commission a 1991 Nissan Figaro.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team take on one of their most ambitious projects to date - a 1963 Lotus Elan Series 1. Their second project could also amaze... by showing a profit... a 90s BMW 3 series.

programme.title: Tropic of Cancer
programme.desc: This episode takes Simon through Bangladesh and on a perilous covert journey into Burma, where western journalists are banned. In Bangladesh Simon sails down the mighty Padma River and visits fishermen who use trained otters to drive fish into their nets. From North East India, Simon treks through jungles into Burma to meet the Chin people - an ethnic group who are oppressed by the Burmese government.

programme.title: Train Truckers
programme.desc: A CBD80 battery-powered loco needs to be hauled 20 miles from a factory in Burton-on-Trent to the heritage Chasewater Railway in Staffordshire.

programme.title: Train Rescue Down Under
programme.desc: A locomotive needs a quick double bogie change to get back to the sugarcane harvest. Meanwhile, the heat is on for a tricky air conditioner replacement.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Does one fewer wheel mean cheaper bills? Thats the question the team want to find out this week as they take on a three wheeled wonder - the Reliant Robin.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek navigates the dry stone walls of the Peak District to collect a very original 1988 Opel Manta, Dave handles a rare Ford Granada rally support vehicle, and Paul contends with a Hilux monster truck.

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Henry Cole and Simon OBrien travel the length of Britain seeking items to fix up and flog on to make a handsome profit for their owners. In this episode, Henry gives Simon a motorcycling masterclass in Wiltshire.

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Exploring the honeymoon home of a young princess and grand monuments designed by the most notorious dictator of the twentieth century.

The film was Indian cinemas biggest hit in 2006, with special effects and stunts that stole the hearts of millions of Indians.

programme.title: Koi ... Mil Gaya
programme.desc: Indian scientist Sanjay Mehra is convinced life exists beyond the earth and manages to send a message into space. When at last he receives an answer, no one believes there may be aliens out there but Sanjay and his pregnant wife, Sonia, see a UFO at first hand. Following a car accident, Sanjay dies and Sonia has their son, Rohit Mehra but as the boy grows physically, his mind remains that of a child.

programme.title: Heer Ranjha
programme.desc: Heer and Deedho, childhood sweethearts, are torn apart by family differences, and Heer take off to live an anonymous life as a farmer.
